head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BRAVERMAN, ARTHUR ALAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BRAVERMAN, ARTHUR ALAN

block.p: BRAVERMAN--Arthur Alan, of Rockville Centre, NY, died peacefully on January 7th, 2007. Beloved husband of Myrna, loving father of Felice, the late Howard Baturin, Diane and William Levy, and Robyn and Bernard Dolington. Poppy of Spencer, Mallory, Nicole and Samantha. He will forever be in our hearts. Services Tuesday, 12pm at ''Boulevard-Riverside Chapel'', 1450 Broadway, Hewlett NY.
